amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $10 million and increases funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities by $5 million with offsets from the National Park Service, Departmental Management, and National Forest System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to restore funding for the NEA to previous levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 200, 1 Present (Roll no. 376).
